subject: PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Oak Hill Country Club in Pittsford, N.Y., site of the 2003 P.G.A. Championship, has been chosen to stage two more of golf's showcase events — the Senior P.G.A. Championship in 2008 and the P.G.A. Championship in 2013.
snippet: Oak Hill Country Club in Pittsford, N.Y., site of the 2003 P.G.A. Championship, has been chosen to stage two more of golf's showcase events — the Senior P.G.A. Championship in 2008 and the P.G.A. Championship in 2013.
